title: HEXTECH CHESTS!
body: So if I have 3 450 ip champion shards and I reroll do I get a 1350 ip champion? And if I have 3 1350 do I get a 3150 ip champion? And vice versa?

replies.body:
Hey there,

AFAIK rerolling is pretty much random, except you won't get a champion permanent of a champ you already own.

>**Rerolling** 
Reroll three similar types of loot into permanent loot of the same type (for example, reroll three different champion shards into a permanent champion guaranteed not to be a duplicate of one you own).
